name: The skeletal flail called 'The dead man's hand' (1h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It does psionic damage unbelievably much.
